According to the file sizes of the different files it is not fake. I have downloaded the patches individually outside of this torrent, and its the same size as the patch in this torrent. Seems to be identical and not fake.

How do you think toni32 earned his trusted mark? By uploading fake torrents? Of course it works. The game contains a lot of bugs though. But most of it got fixed in the 1.1 Patch wich is included in this download.
Doesn't this version have a broken Single player? I dl'd the skidrow version and no campaign really; suggestions?
